question: company issued me medical insurance card...Is it permissible for me to use such card
answer:
QUESTION
My company has issued me medical insurance card with which i can go to some designated hospitals for check up and i only have to pay 15sr for whatever the fee of the doctor and the rest is being paid by the insurance company. Is it permissible for me to use such card. Pls elaborate.
ANSWER


Share:
If you did not take out the medical insurance and the company has offered you the use of their medical insurance card, then you may do so.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
